thread.title_full: Labor force participation rate has fallen to its lowest level since the grim days of 1977 | Opinion - Conservative

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Labor force participation rate has fallen to its lowest level since the grim days of 1977 | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
Some graphs to show what is happening in the American economy:
The steady unemployment rate is only because more and more people are leaving the workforce, such that the labor force participation rate has fallen to its lowest level since the grim days of 1977 at 62.4% from 62.7%.
All information provided by Elles Economy
